title: Katie Holmes chats on the phone while 13-year-old daughter Suri
text:
Katie Holmes cut a bold figure in wide-leg tattersall print pants on Saturday on a stroll through NYC.

The Dawson's Creek darling wore a longline navy blue coat to pull together the ensemble over a vintage graphic tee.

Katie, 40, had her hair pulled into a messy bun and shaded her vision with a pair of cat-eye sunglasses.

Strut: Katie Holmes cut a bold figure in orange plaid-printed pants with a wide leg on Saturday as she gabbed on the phone on a stroll through NYC

Her feet hit the pavement in a pair of pointed-toe stiletto heels in black.

She chatted animatedly as she enjoyed her solo walk, with daughter Suri Cruise elsewhere for the day.

The ex of Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx's recent style statements are just two among the many she's made since her split from Foxx.

In place of her usual comfortable activewear, she has been seen donning plunging tops and figure-flattering dresses.

Chic: The Dawson's Creek darling wore a longline navy blue coat to pull together the ensemble over a vintage graphic tee

Chatty: Katie, 40, had her hair pulled into a messy bun and shaded her vision with a pair of cat-eye sunglasses

Many have raved over Katie's new look, with her designer pal Zac Posen gushing to Entertainment Tonight: 'I'm just digging everything and how Katie Holmes, my dear friend, is looking lately.

'She just is looking super hot, feeling good and making the style pages.'

Katie and 51-year-old Foxx were first reported to have split in August.
